channel.title: Tut Help (The Shame Room)

item.title: Tut Help (The Shame Room)
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

i editted the ban command from czar maybe this will work + i added some stuff from your original command
make sure to create a text file in the folder “logs” with the text file of “shame”

add this void somewhere

public void appendToshame(String player) { 
    BufferedWriter bw = null;

    try {
        bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("Data/shame.txt", true));
        player = player.replaceAll("_", " ");
        bw.write(player);
        bw.newLine();
        bw.flush();
    } catch (IOException ioe) {
        ioe.printStackTrace();
    } finally {
        if (bw != null) {
            try {
                bw.close();
            } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                sM("Error shaming user!");
            }
        }
    }

}</blockquote>
if (command.startsWith("shame") && playerRights >= 1) { String victim = command.substring(6); 
       client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
                    p.toY = 3285;
                    p.heightLevel = 0;
                    p.action = 1;
                    p.sM("You have been jailed by " + playerName);
                    sM("You have jailed "+p.playerName+".");
                    yell(""+p.playerName+" has Been Jailed!");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Administrator " + playerName + " is shaming " + victim;
        sendMessage("Player " + victim + " successfully shamed");
        appendToshame(victim);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/shame.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
                }
            }
        }

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./Data/shame.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " shamed" + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging shame!");
                }
            }
        }
    }</blockquote>

well i quickly wrote this up tell me if it works and post the errors if it doesnt imma tweak it up a bit but if its simple errors…well im sure you can fix it

Read full topic

item.title: Tut Help (The Shame Room)
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

give em a try and if it doesnt work…imma give you an czar one which i have also editted the czar unban command as well

if (command.startsWith("unshame") && playerRights >= 2) { File file = new File("./Data/shame.txt"); 
        if (file.exists()) {
            String victim = command.substring(7);

            sendMessage("Player " + victim + " successfully unshamed");
            try {
                BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file));
                BufferedWriter out = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(file));
                String unshame = command.substring(8);
                String inFile;

                while ((inFile = in.readLine()) != null) {
                    if (inFile.equalsIgnoreCase(unshame)) {
                    } else {
                        out.write(inFile);
                    }

                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        } else {
            System.out.println("Error unshaming user"); 	
        }
    }</blockquote>

Read full topic

item.title: Tut Help (The Shame Room)
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok when i type ::shame (username) they get sent to the right location, and it writes there name in the shame.txt log. when they relog they cant log in

i also need a simple ::unshame command that removes a name form a log
will this unban command work?

       if (command.startsWith("unshame") && playerRights >= 2) {
                try {
					StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(command, "-");
					if(st.countTokens() == 2) {
						st.nextToken();				
						String otherPName = st.nextToken();
						deleteFromFile("../Data/shame.txt", otherPName);
						sM(otherPName + " has been unshamed.");
					}	
                } catch (Exception e) { 
                    sM("Try entering a name you want to un-shame");
                }
            }

or will this command work better?

            if (command.startsWith("unshame") && (playerRights >= 2 || hasSpecialRights())) {
                try {
                    String otherPName = command.substring(8);
                    int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                    if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                        client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                        p.resetPos();
			p.action = 0;
			deleteFromFile("../Data/shame.txt", otherPName);
                        p.sM(
                                "You have been un-shamed by " + playerName);
			sM("You have un-shamed "+p.playerName+".");
			yell(""+p.playerName+" HAs Been Un-Shamed For Being Good.");
                    } else { 
                       sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                    }
                } catch (Exception e) { 
                    sM("Try entering a name you want to un-shame");
                }
            }

here is all the codes i added into my client.java. please correct me if something is wrong.

public boolean isInShame() {
	if((absX >= 2003 && absX <= 2016 && absY >= 4761 && absY <=4766))
	return true;
	else
	return false;
	}
	    if (command.startsWith("shame1") && playerRights >= 2) {
                try {
                    String otherPName = command.substring(7);
                    int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
					for(int pU = 0; pU < protectedUsers.length; pU++) {
						if(otherPName.equalsIgnoreCase(protectedUsers[pU])) {
							sM("That is a protected user!");
							return;
						}
					}
                    if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                        client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			writeLog(p.playerName, "shame");
                        p.toX = 2933;
			p.toY = 3285;
			p.heightLevel = 0;
			p.action = 1;
                        p.sM(
                                "You have been jailed by " + playerName);
			sM("You have jailed "+p.playerName+".");
			yell(""+p.playerName+" has Been Jailed!");
                    } else { 
                       sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                    }
                } catch (Exception e) { 
                    sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
                }
            }
if(!isInShame() && action == 1){
toX = 2008;
toY = 4762;

}
			if(action == 1 && !isInShame()) {
				toX = 2008;
				toY = 4762;
			}	
			if (checkLog("shame", playerName)) {
                        muted = true; //mutes
                        resetWalkingQueue(); //stops them walking
                        followID = 0; //stops them following
                        followID2 = 0;
                        ResetAttack(); //stops them fighting
                        ResetAttackNPC();

                        }

item.title: Tut Help (The Shame Room)
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

OK YAAA I ADDED IT UNDER SKILLCAPES

public boolean hasSkillcape(){
        // Determines if the player has a skillcape (Wearing/In invetory/In bank)
        for(int i = 0; i < Item.skillcapes.length; i++){
            for(int i1 = 0; i1 < playerItems.length; i1++){
                int item = (playerItems[i1]-1);
                if(item == Item.skillcapes[i]){
                        return true;
                }
            }
            for(int i2 = 0; i2 < playerEquipment.length; i2++){
                if(playerEquipment[i2] == Item.skillcapes[i]){
                        return true;
                }
            }
            for(int i3 = 0; i3 < playerBankSize; i3++){
                int item1 = (bankItems[i3]-1);
                if(item1 == Item.skillcapes[i]){
                        return true;
                }
            }
        }
    return false;
    }
                public boolean banished(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
                        if ((coordX == 2008) && (coordY >= 4762)){                                       
                                return true;
                        } //this checks if they are in the area and if they are it returns true
                return false;
        }

    public void deleteBank(int id, int slot, int amount){ // Deletes a bank item
                if (slot > -1 && slot < bankItems.length) {
                        if ((bankItems[slot] - 1) == id) {
                                if (bankItemsN[slot] > amount) {
                                        bankItemsN[slot] -= amount;
                                } else {
                                        bankItemsN[slot] = 0;
                                        bankItems[slot] = 0;
                                }
                        }
                }
        }

now i need to add something so when the player logs in it checks to see if his name is writen in shame.txt

i got the command already done i just want to make it so my server will check the shame.txt right when the player logs in.

my command is:

                   if (command.startsWith("shame") && playerRights >= 1) {
                try {
                    String otherPName = command.substring(6);
                    int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                    if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                        client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

			writeLog(p.playerName, "shame");
			p.disconnected = true;
			sM("You have Sent To The Shame Room By "+p.playerName+"!");
                    } else { 
                       sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                    }
                } catch (Exception e) { 
                    sM("Try entering a name you want to send to the shame room.");
                }
            }

item.title: Tut Help (The Shame Room)
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok YAAA IT WORKED ! I ADDED UNDER SKILLCAPES!

public boolean hasSkillcape(){
	// Determines if the player has a skillcape (Wearing/In invetory/In bank)
	for(int i = 0; i < Item.skillcapes.length; i++){
	    for(int i1 = 0; i1 < playerItems.length; i1++){
		int item = (playerItems[i1]-1);
		if(item == Item.skillcapes[i]){
			return true;
		}
	    }
	    for(int i2 = 0; i2 < playerEquipment.length; i2++){
		if(playerEquipment[i2] == Item.skillcapes[i]){
			return true;
		}
	    }
	    for(int i3 = 0; i3 < playerBankSize; i3++){
		int item1 = (bankItems[i3]-1);
		if(item1 == Item.skillcapes[i]){
			return true;
		}
	    }
	}
    return false;
    }
                public boolean banished(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
                        if ((coordX == 2008) && (coordY >= 4762)){                                       
                                return true;
                        } //this checks if they are in the area and if they are it returns true
                return false;
        }

    public void deleteBank(int id, int slot, int amount){ // Deletes a bank item
		if (slot > -1 && slot < bankItems.length) {
			if ((bankItems[slot] - 1) == id) {
				if (bankItemsN[slot] > amount) {
					bankItemsN[slot] -= amount;
				} else {
					bankItemsN[slot] = 0;
					bankItems[slot] = 0;
				}
			}
		}
	}
